DOC.brief_summary: A Study evaluate cognitive effect tolerance Multi-Vitamin/Mineral Preperation contain Gingko elderly subject age associate memory impairment .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Evaluate The Effects Of Multivitamin/Mineral With Ginko In Subjects With Age Associated Memory Impairment
DOC.criteria: Subject generally healthy ( include subject present mild chronic disease disease and/or pharmacological treatment result psychomotor impairment improvement ) . Subject either gender , 60+ year age , inclusive . Subject demonstrate Age Associated Memory Impairment completion CDR test battery comparison normative data . Female subject postmenopausal . Subject able understand study instruction give write informed consent prior study participation . Subject admit study orient person , place time ability communicate study staff . Subject , opinion study staff , motivate participate complete study instruct . Subject willing attend visit wellrested state . Subject participate interventional study within one month prior screen . Intake within three month prior screen , intend intake study , one following : Ginkgo biloba , St John 's Wort , Ginseng , Gotu Kola ( Indian Pennywort ) , daily dos vitamin E ( tocopherol ) 30 mg , folic acid 400 g , vitamin B1 ( thiamine ) , B2 ( riboflavin ) , B6 ( pyridoxine ) 2 mg , cognition enhancer . Subject history psychological illness condition interfere subject 's ability understand requirement study . Subject history Alzheimers disease , dementia , mental retardation , Morbus Parkinson , mental disorder . Subject diagnose AAMI completion CDR test battery comparison normative data . Subject history bleeding/coagulation disorder ( e.g. , haemophilia , Protein C S deficiency ) . Subject taking/being treated concomitant medication may affect/inhibit blood coagulation ( e.g. , warfarin , aspirin , heparin ) . Subject history relevant vascular disorder ( e.g. , carotid stenosis , stroke , PRIND , coronary artery disease , peripheral vascular disease , thrombosis ) . Subject Body Mass Index ( BMI ) 40 kg/m2 ( severely obese ) . Subject smoke 15 cigarette , equivalent daily . Subject moderatetosevere hepatic impairment . Subject history alcohol drug abuse . Subject known allergy intolerance ingredient study preparation . Subject intend undergo surgery immediately upon completion ( within two week ) study participation .
